## Versionierte Notebook-St√§nde

```{python}
import os, json
from IPython.display import Markdown, display

versions_dir = "notebooks/versions"
rows = []

if os.path.isdir(versions_dir):
    for name in sorted(os.listdir(versions_dir)):
        if name.endswith(".ipynb") and "_checkpoint" not in name:
            meta_file = os.path.join(versions_dir, name + ".meta.json")
            msg = ""
            if os.path.exists(meta_file):
                try:
                    with open(meta_file, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
                        msg = json.load(f).get("message", "")
                except Exception:
                    pass
            # Falls es eine bereits gerenderte HTML-Version gibt, lieber die verlinken
            html_name = name.replace(".ipynb", ".html")
            link_target = f"{versions_dir}/{html_name}" if os.path.exists(os.path.join(versions_dir, html_name)) else f"{versions_dir}/{name}"
            rows.append((name, msg, link_target))

if rows:
    md = ["| Snapshot | Kommentar |", "|---|---|"]
    for name, msg, href in rows:
        md.append(f"| [{name}]({href}) | {msg} |")
    display(Markdown("\n".join(md)))
else:
    display(Markdown("_Noch keine Snapshots gespeichert._"))
```
